name: Notion Resume Template
description: Spice up your competitiveness using this minimal notion template.Template Inclusions.Create a simple resume with notion.Create a shareable resume with a click of a button to anyone.Share the resume as a Link or as PDF.Resume template contains all necessary themes that professional resumes ought to have.
features: Create a simple resume with notion.; Create a shareable resume with a click of a button to anyone.; Share the resume as a Link or as PDF.; Resume template contains all necessary themes that professional resumes ought to have.
